name: The Disappearance of Gumster Co.
description:
We are a family-owned company of 10 gumballs. There's Gumster Sr. (the founder)... ummm... where's grandpa Gumster? He was kidnapped by the Veggie mafia!?

My New Mission:

Save Gumster Sr.!
